summary: This document is a financial transfer recap email from July 2014, detailing the movement of banking and investment assets from JPMorgan to UBS for Ghislaine Maxwell and several associated entities. It provides a snapshot of her financial holdings and corporate structure at the time.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Account holder and subject of financial transfer
persons.context: The primary individual whose personal and corporate financial accounts are being transferred from JPMorgan to UBS, with significant assets listed.

events.title: Financial Transfer Recap
events.description: An email is sent recapping the transfer of banking and investment assets from JPMorgan to UBS for Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities.

keyFacts: As of late 2013/early 2014, Ghislaine Maxwell held total assets valued at approximately $14.7 million, comprising about $3.3 million in banking assets and $11.4 million in investment assets.

The financial structure involves several entities linked to Maxwell, including the Max Foundation, 116 East 65th Street LLC, Pot and Kettle LLC, Ellmax LLC, TerraMar Project, Inc., and Max Hotel Services Corp.
The document records an ongoing process to transfer these assets from JPMorgan to UBS, with some accounts completed and others, including a large $5.26 million investment account, still in process.
